entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 1 with temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late this afternoon. High minus 1 with temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023
